name: Majlis Cushion Covers in Traditional Fabrics
description:
Traditional Style Majlis Covers. A majlis is the traditional sitting area in an Arab household. Our cushion covers are made with traditional designed heavy duty fabrics. Zip Closure. 

Cushion Type:
Back Cushion: 55 cm X 65 cm - $12.95
Bottom: 2 metres (200 cm X 70 cm X 10 cm) - $34.95
Bottom: 3 metres (300 cm X 70 cm X 10 cm) - $49.95
Roll Cushion: $14.95

Colours:
Traditional Red (as seen in back cushions in photo)
Traditional White (as seen in roll cushions in photo)

For more information, please contact: service@arabianoutpost.com.

Custom sizing and other fabrics are available.

Thank you for your interest.

name: Premium frankincense لُبَّانٌ
description:
High quality frankincense from the Boswellia tree. Our product originates from the Salalah area in Oman and is known as Hojari. High-grade resin with translucent granules. 

Frankincense has been used for centuries for its special qualities in purification rituals and traditional medicine.

Free sample available with any order from our website. 


50g   - $9.99
100g - $16.99
250g - $33.98 (50g FREE)
500g - $49.99
1kg   - $79.99

name: Solid Perfume Locket by Syed Junaid
description:
Very sweet gift for a lady. 

Qaium Solid Perfume Locket 

Lovely floral locket design in silver.

Solid perfume locket of 5g

Notes:

Top :      Peach/Freesia
Heart :   Violet / Red Fruit
Bottom : Jasmine / Mimosa

$23.98 

About Junaid Perfumes:

The Arab World has long been renowned for its magnificent natural oils and fragrances that ensnare the senses and captivate the mind. For centuries, the legendary spice routes of Arabia retained worldwide fame for its trade in luxury oil and exotic spices that were highly desirable and sought after in Europe and around the world. 

History has witnessed the evolution of perfumery, since the early times, from distillation of essential oils and scented water, to a thriving perfume industry of the Arabian Gulf in the 20th century. Syed Junaid Alam, Perfumers since 1910, have been at the forefront of this progression.
